title: Ber86
author: Ber86
created_time: July 10, 2022, 03:01:00 PMLast edit: July 15, 2022, 09:25:51 PM by Ber86
content: Adonx Exchanger is a CEX, with unique features, the project was architected 1 years ago, and has been developed in the last few months, we are in the final pre-launch phase.  We have faced many challenges, but we are not willing to give up.  Adonx is the platform's token is an ERC-20 with a supply of 21 million tokens. We did an ICO, and an IEO, with low participation in 2021, in which we raised approximately 20ETH, in total we sold about 300k Adonx tokens.  The funds have been used to fund the platform.You can check more about Adonx token here on Bitcointalk thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5320459.0 The proposal then is as follows, we can provide the following conditions as an investment or loan.In exchange for 5BTC/100000USDT we offer 500000 Adonx plus 5% of our platform monthly revenue.Amount: 5wBTC/100000USDT wBTC/USDT Address for (5BTC): 0xF0d71c4BA1aE0bd305dCD28f00c8EAC118eaDc71 (our smartcontract address for usdt/wBTC) For more references you can check Platform Progress https://ibb.co/nbS7W5T https://ibb.co/YP61qzP https://ibb.co/NLzVTdJ https://ibb.co/ygmcmDQ Whitepaper: https://docdro.id/SMyKQXZBitcointalk: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5320459.0Adonx EtherScan: https://etherscan.io/token/0x1aa11f0feafb5db797764916f0d67a4fe8132985
